meta_text: ROL LAG BCANGS_’A Gift of Liberation, Put in the Palm of Your Hand; the Heart of the Nectar of Holy Advices; the Very Essence of All the Highest of Spoken Words,’ representing Profound, Complete, and Unerring Instruction taken down as Notes during a Teaching, of the Kind Based on Personal Experience, on the Steps of the Path to Enlightenment, the Heart-Essence of the Incomparable King of the Dharma_SKYABS RJE PHA BONG KHA PA BDE CHEN SNYING PO (1878-1941)
